thread.title: BRIEF-Ceres Global AG And Consolidated Grain And Barge Co Announce Formation Of Savage Riverport Llc

title: BRIEF-Ceres Global AG And Consolidated Grain And Barge Co Announce Formation Of Savage Riverport Llc

organizations.name: brief-ceres global ag and consolidated grain and barge co announce formation of savage riverport llc
ge co announce formation of savage riverport llc reuters

text:
May 1, 2018 / 11:21 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Ceres Global AG And Consolidated Grain And Barge Co Announce Formation Of Savage Riverport Llc Reuters Staff
May 1 (Reuters) - Ceres Global Ag Corp:
* CERES GLOBAL AG AND CONSOLIDATED GRAIN AND BARGE CO. ANNOUNCE FORMATION OF SAVAGE RIVERPORT LLC
* CERES GLOBAL AG CORP - SAVAGE TERMINAL WILL BE OWNED & OPERATED AS A JOINT VENTURE BETWEEN TWO COMPANIES
* CERES GLOBAL AG - FACILITY HAS 9.2 MILLION BUSHELS OF GRAIN STORAGE WITH HIGH SPEED TRUCK & RAIL RECEIVING CAPACITY, RAIL AND BARGE SHIPPING CAPABILITIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
